WORLD TRADE ORGANIZATION

Global trade - The World Trade Organization (WTO) deals with the global rules of trade between nations. Its main function is to ensure that global trade flows smoothly, predictably and freely as possible.

Please personalize your account

Dear User,

You appear to have logged on to wto.org using the generic account of . You are strongly encouraged to create an individual account in order to benefit from features such as personalization through myWTO Link: /english/forums_e/personalization_e/mywto_public_e.htm and e-subscriptions Link: https://docs.wto.org/dol2fe/Restricted/Esubscription/User/PageSubscriptionCreateUpdate.aspx?language=ENGLISH . It is also more secure to connect though an individual account, rather than a shared one.

Please contact your delegation coordinator to obtain an individual account (username and password).
